uClinux 2.6 kernel for Bluetechnix CM_BF533

About the Port

ADSP-BF533   Blackfin™ Distribution Alpha1 Release 08.10.2004

Release Notes: This release incorporates a complete port of the uClinux-dist for Blackfin. This release has been tested on ADSP-BF533 based CM-BF533 Boards. 
  • All system calls found to be working now. Network support has been added and tested (SMSC 91C111) (telnet client and server, inetd, ftp client and server,etc.)
  • Data and Instruction Cache Support.
  • CPLB Management. You can enable Data cache and Network.
  • Priority Driven Interrupt Management
  • 0.9.26 uClibc library.
  • EXT3/EXT2/CRAMFS/JFFS2/ROMFS File system support

     For more feature list please download the distribution from http://blackfin.uclinux.org.
